sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import './css/content.css' var routine = require('./routine.json') function Routine_Temp() { var days = ["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"] var ext_date = ()=>{ var date = new Date(); var day = date.getDay(); return day } useEffect(()=>{ if(ext_date()!==0 && ext_date()!==6){ var table_rows = routine[ext_date()-1].map((data)=>{ return( {data.class_name} {data.class_code} {data.S_Time} {data.E_TIME} {data.Status} ) }) } }) return (
SUBJECT SUBJECT-CODE S-TIME E-TIME ATTENDENCE STATUS
ENGLISH-LAB HU-201 10:00 11:00 DONE
) } export default Routine_Temp
